Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The subject property is conveniently located along Commercial Drive and nestled between Napier and William Streets in one of Vancouver's most vibrant areas known as "The Drive." The Drive makes up 22 blocks of some of the city's most unique dining establishments, charming specialty shops, theaters and eccentric cafes. Home to Vancouver's historic Little Italy community, The Drive is a top destination for retailers of all kinds.

Located on the corner of Alexander and Main Street in Gastown.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Ready for it’s next exciting office or retail office or retail concept, 191 Alexander Street is well located at the junction of Gastown, Crosstown, and Chinatown, and steps to Downtown. Built in 1910, this masterpiece was designed by prominent architectural firm Maclure & Fox and pays homage to Edwardian Free Rationalism style. As a ground level suite, the space boasts a private entrance directly into the space, signage opportunity, rare 16 ft ceilings and a loft feature. The space is surrounded by several prominent office and retail locations including Appnovation, Aritzia HQ, Monstercat, Herschel HQ, Alibi Room, The Birds and the Beets, Ask for Luigi, and more!

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text: Sales Representative

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Subject Property is located in Chinatown, just minutes from Downtown Vancouver. Chinatown is home to an eclectic mix of traditional and trendy eateries, markets, gardens, historical attractions and wide assortment of business ranging from tea shops and apothecaries to art galleries and vintage stores. Theold-meets new theme continues in the architecture, which includes several character brick buildings and striking new condos.Notable area tenants include Matchstick Coffee, Bao Bei, KissaTanto, The Ramen Butcher, Virtuous Pie and Phnom Phen

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The subject property is prominently located on the northwest corner of East Cordova and Columbia Streets in the heart of Vancouver’s trendy Gastown neighbourhood. Just steps away you will find countless boutique restaurants, artisanal shops and fitness studios. The location is incredibly transit friendly with several major bus routes stopping at its doorstep, a 7-minute walk to Stadium- Chinatown SkyTrain Station and a 10-minute walk to Waterfront Skytrain Station which connects to the Canada Line, Expo Line, WestCoast Express, and SeaBus Terminal.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | HIGH EXPOSURE RETAIL UNIT IN GASTOWN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The available retail units are located at The Landing, one of Vancouver’s first “skyscrapers” which once served as one of the largest warehouses in Vancouver devoted to produce serving gold rush miners. In 1988, The Landing was meticulously retrofit to include office, retail and restaurant. Today, The Landing is one of the cities most revered heritage buildings, an iconic Vancouver landmark.The Landing is conveniently located only steps away from Waterfront Station - the major transit hub of the City, providing access to all nodes of Metro Vancouver via the SeaBus, SkyTrain, Canada Line or Westcoast Express.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
LOCATION
Located on the north west corner of West Georgia and Burrard Streets, Vancouver’s busiest intersection, Royal Centre is conveniently situated within the business and retail amenities of downtown Vancouver. Royal Centre is a Class A office building located in the prime Central Business District of downtown Vancouver. This 589,000-square-foot, 37-storey building is adjacent to the Vancouver Hyatt Regency Hotel. It is also one of the largest office buildings in the Central Business District.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Executive Vice President
Sales Representative

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Subject Property is located on the southeast corner of Granville Street and Smithe Street in the heart of Vancouver’s main shopping and entertainment district. This lively area of Granville Street has endless options when it comes to restaurants, bars, nightclubs, specialty stores and trendy retailers, not to mention the Subject Property is just a minutes’ walk to CF Pacific Centre (±1 million sq. ft. enclosed mall). Many of the city’s bus lines transit through Granville, making it a main thoroughfare for the city. Neighbouring tenants include Hotel Belmont Vancouver, The Roxy Cabaret, Vogue Theatre, Cinema Public House, The Commodore Ballroom, Venue Nightclub, Adidas, Urban Outfitters, Brandy Melville, Nordstrom and more.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR SUBLEASE | HIGH-PROFILE OPPORTUNITY IN THE HEART OF GRANVILLE STREET

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 1193-1195 Robson Street is centrally located within Vancouver’s renowned Robson Street shopping district. The property enjoys excellent frontage on the corner of Robson and Bute with high pedestrian and vehicular traffic counts year round. Shopping is what Robson Street is famous for. The main retail shopping area starts at Granville Street, which is where you’ll find Nordstrom and the entrance to the Pacific Centre shopping mall, and stretches down to Jervis Street. In between, you’ll find most of the major North American fashion brands, along with a lively mix of eateries. Area tenants include Muji Canada, Club Monaco, Cactus Club, Ladurée, Steve Madden, Nike, Aritzia, Banana Republic, Zara and many more.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 425 W 6, by Cressey Development Group, will be Mount Pleasant’s first true office building of scale at 10 stories and 177,450 square feet of office and retail space. Situated at the Northwest corner of West 6th Avenue and Yukon Street this building will not only offer stunning views and state-of-the-art work space, but the location will provide unsurpassed connectivity to the Canada Line and future Broadway Line. The building is designed by IBI Group Architects who have put green space and outdoor amenities at the forefront with many floors featuring private patios and green space and a common rooftop patio with unobstructed views of Downtown Vancouver and the North Shore Mountains.

GROCERY STORE
18,720 sq. ft.
(Inclusive of 3,200 sq. ft. storage)

LEASE RATE
$45.00 per sq. ft.

ADDITIONAL RENT
$15.00 per sq. ft. (estimate)

AVAILABILITY
Q2/Q3 2019

ZONING
CD-1 (451)
Tenant is responsible for verifying allowed uses per the zoning.

PARKING
20-30 stalls (to be finalized)


LOCATION
The Subject Property, situated at the corner of Main Street and East 37th Avenue in Vancouver’s Riley
Park neighbourhood, is the cornerstone of Holborn’s upcoming Little Mountain development.
Riley Park is bounded by 41st Avenue to the south, 16th Avenue to the north, Cambie Street to the west
and Fraser Street to the east. It is a thriving hub with a commercial and retail corridor along Main
Street; home to a variety of unique boutiques, grocers and a blend of restaurants. Riley Park is home
to Hillcrest Community Centre, Nat Bailey Stadium and Queen Elizabeth Park.
Area tenants include Matchstick Coffee, Rexall, Little Mountain Coffee Company, Au Petit Cafe,
Pharmasave, Avalon Dance Shop, LifeLabs, Clarkdale Volkswagen, CIBC and many more.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: lelem is set to introduce a new standard to the residential experience within the University Endowment Lands. A total of 1,200 residential units will be built on the site. The project will be built in two phases and include multifamily residential low-rise and high-rise townhomes, and a commercial village with office space, subsidized rental housing, and 30,000 square feet of retail. This project is due to start October 2019 with an expected completion date of Q1 2022.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: For Lease | Brand New Retail Units In University Endowment Lands
